easysocket.session

Class AioTcpSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • easysocket.session.AioTcpSession

  • public class AioTcpSession
extends java.lang.Object
    Use AioTcpSession to store the information of a socket connection Invoke onReceivePacket(SessionReceivedPacketListener) to specify packet received event lister
    See Also:
    SessionReceivedPacketListener
